item.title: The Resevoir Knowledge-base
item.dc:creator: Jonathan SkjÃ¸tt
item.description: Resevoir started as a blog-like site meant to to document and present already finished projects. It has grown into a place which makes me feel at home on the internet while also providing a space for me to travel through the thoughts and ideas I have had over time. The site is still very much in flux as a result of me experimenting with what structure makes me feel at home.
